answers.answer: Thanks for the info!  I added one for Alden's blood glucose levels.... now I'll just have to remember to update it! :)

question: There are many ladies here who have diabetes, or who have children with diabetes.  This should be a good way to keep track.Med Help has worked very hard to get this one out.  Here's how you add it:Diabetes Tracker:From your profile- Click on My MedHelp- Go to Tracker Panel- Go to bottom of Tracker Panel- Click on { add a tracker ]- Scroll down to add the Diabetes Tracker
title: DIABETES TRACKER NOW AVAILABLE!
